sentences.en: an unconventional approach to the problem
sentences.cn: 另辟蹊径解决这个问题的方法

sentences.en: As for unconventional weapons, the genie is unfortunately already out of the bottle.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，非常规武器已经带来难以收拾的局面。

sentences.en: Despite his unconventional methods, he has inspired pupils more than anyone else.
sentences.cn: 尽管他的方法不同寻常，但他给予学生的激励比其他人都要多。

sentences.en: He continues to tread an unconventional path.
sentences.cn: 他还是不按传统方式行事。

sentences.en: He was known for his unconventional behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他的特立独行是众所周知的。

sentences.en: His effortless calligraphy has an unconventional grace of its own.
sentences.cn: 他的书法,信笔写来,十分超脱.

sentences.en: Linus Pauling is an unconventional genius.
sentences.cn: 莱纳斯·鲍林是个标新立异的天才人物。

sentences.en: Our unconventional behaviour did in fact shock some of our more straitlaced friends.
sentences.cn: 我们这一不合常规的行为实际上着实让我们的一些一本正经的朋友吓了一大跳。

sentences.en: That was an unconventional party, where formalities are ruled out.
sentences.cn: 那是一次“不落俗套”的聚会, 一切形式礼节都免了!

sentences.en: The vaccine had been produced by an unconventional technique.
sentences.cn: 该疫苗是用非传统工艺生产的。

sentences.en: There was evidence that such an unconventional approach might work.
sentences.cn: 有证据表明,这种违反常规的方法是可能奏效的.

sentences.en: You don't need a Ph.D to decode their work, but they do try to challenge audiences with unconventional material.
sentences.cn: 解读他们的作品并不需要有博士学位，但他们的确在尝试用一些非传统素材来挑战观众的接受度。

sentences.en: You're deliberately unconventional. Even your choice of clothes is a statement of your non-conformity.
sentences.cn: 你故意有悖传统，甚至连着装都在表明自己不认同主流思想。

sentences.en: Zita was herself unconventional, keeping a safety-pin stuck through her ear lobe.
sentences.cn: 齐塔自己就不守传统，在一只耳垂上穿了一根别针。

words.tran_cn: 非常规的；非传统的；不依惯例的

trans.tran_cn: 非传统的，非常规的，不依惯例的，通脱自喜
trans.tran_en: If you describe a person or their attitude or behaviour as unconventional, you mean that they do not behave in the same way as most other people in their society
